attachment theory is a Western Eurocentric based theory that focuses on the emotional aspects of the mother-infant relationship is and is considered foundational for healthy child development .依恋理论是源于西欧地区的一种理论，聚焦于研究母婴关系中的情感因素，被认为是儿童健康发育的基础。
